properties.description:
Source 2-4 load data three times from the same file, to create
columns for each variable for every year. Select 6-8 drops unnecessary columns. Then (left) join the streams together in join 1 and 2. 

Issues:
Select 9 Alue-field mapping keeps dropping by itself.
The fields seems to be strings, but are actually decimals in SQL.

properties.description:
Read data from 5 Demographic files and join them together in to a single SQL table. Select 11 renames Postinumero to Postnum, as there was an issue with same named columns in Join5. In join 5 the data is joined based on first 5 characters of Postinumeroalue (=Postinumero), which is also derived in DerivedColumn -tranformation. Also Alue and Kaupunki are derived in this transformation.

Issues:
Mappings keeps dropping from select9.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Postinumeroalue as string,
		{Asukkaat yhteensa, 2017 (HE)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keski-ika, 2017 (HE)} as integer,
		{Alemman korkeakoulututkinnon suorittaneet, 2017 (KO)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keskitulot, 2016 (HR)} as integer,
		{Taloudet yhteensa, 2017 (TE)} as integer,
		{Talouksien keskikoko, 2017 (TE)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Omistusasunnoissa asuvat taloudet, 2017 (TE)} as integer,
		{Asuntojen keskipinta-ala, 2017 (RA)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Tyolliset, 2016 (PT)} as integer,
		{Tyottomat, 2016 (PT)} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Demograph2016
source(output(
		Postinumeroalue as string,
		{Asukkaat yhteensa, 2016 (HE)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keski-ika, 2016 (HE)} as integer,
		{Alemman korkeakoulututkinnon suorittaneet, 2016 (KO)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keskitulot, 2015 (HR)} as integer,
		{Taloudet yhteensa, 2016 (TE)} as integer,
		{Talouksien keskikoko, 2016 (TE)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Omistusasunnoissa asuvat taloudet, 2016 (TE)} as integer,
		{Asuntojen keskipinta-ala, 2016 (RA)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Tyolliset, 2015 (PT)} as integer,
		{Tyottomat, 2015 (PT)} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Demograph2015
source(output(
		Postinumeroalue as string,
		{Asukkaat yhteensa, 2015 (HE)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keski-ika, 2015 (HE)} as integer,
		{Alemman korkeakoulututkinnon suorittaneet, 2014 (KO)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keskitulot, 2014 (HR)} as integer,
		{Taloudet yhteensa, 2015 (TE)} as integer,
		{Talouksien keskikoko, 2015 (TE)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Omistusasunnoissa asuvat taloudet, 2015 (TE)} as integer,
		{Asuntojen keskipinta-ala, 2015 (RA)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Tyolliset, 2014 (PT)} as integer,
		{Tyottomat, 2014 (PT)} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Demograph2014
source(output(
		Postinumeroalue as string,
		{Asukkaat yhteensa, 2014 (HE)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keski-ika, 2014 (HE)} as integer,
		{Alemman korkeakoulututkinnon suorittaneet, 2013 (KO)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keskitulot, 2013 (HR)} as integer,
		{Taloudet yhteensa, 2014 (TE)} as integer,
		{Talouksien keskikoko, 2014 (TE)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Omistusasunnoissa asuvat taloudet, 2014 (TE)} as string,
		{Asuntojen keskipinta-ala, 2014 (RA)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Tyolliset, 2013 (PT)} as string,
		{Tyottomat, 2013 (PT)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Demograph2013
source(output(
		Postinumeroalue as string,
		{Asukkaat yhteensa, 2013 (HE)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keski-ika, 2013 (HE)} as integer,
		{Alemman korkeakoulututkinnon suorittaneet, 2012 (KO)} as integer,
		{Asukkaiden keskitulot, 2012 (HR)} as integer,
		{Taloudet yhteensa, 2013 (TE)} as integer,
		{Talouksien keskikoko, 2013 (TE)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Omistusasunnoissa asuvat taloudet, 2013 (TE)} as integer,
		{Asuntojen keskipinta-ala, 2013 (RA)} as decimal(10,0),
		{Tyolliset, 2012 (PT)} as integer,
		{Tyottomat, 2012 (PT)} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Demograph2012
Demograph2016, Demograph2015 join(Demograph2016@Postinumeroalue == Demograph2015@Postinumeroalue,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2, Demograph2014 join(Demograph2016@Postinumeroalue == Demograph2014@Postinumeroalue,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join3
Join3, Demograph2013 join(Demograph2016@Postinumeroalue == Demograph2013@Postinumeroalue,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join4
Select10, Select11 join(substring(Postinumeroalue, 1, 5) == substring(Postnum, 1, 5),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'left')~> Join5
Join5 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select8
Select8 derive(Postinumero = substring(Postinumeroalue, 1, 5),
		Alue = trim(substring(Postinumeroalue, instr(Postinumeroalue, ' '), instr(Postinumeroalue, '(') - instr(Postinumeroalue, ' '))),
		Kaupunki = trim(substring(Postinumeroalue, instr(Postinumeroalue, '('), 50),' ())')) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		Postinumero,
		Asukkaat_yhteensa_2017 = {Asukkaat yhteensa, 2017 (HE)},
		Keski_ika_2017 = {Asukkaiden keski-ika, 2017 (HE)},
		Tyolliset_2012 = Postinumeroalue,
		Alempi_korkeakoulututkinto_2016 = {Alemman korkeakoulututkinnon suorittaneet, 2017 (KO)},

		Talouksien_keskikoko_2016 = {Talouksien keskikoko, 2016 (TE)},
		Omistusasunto_taloudet_2016 = {Omistusasunnoissa asuvat taloudet, 2016 (TE)},
		Asuntojen_keskipinta_ala_2016 = {Asuntojen keskipinta-ala, 2016 (RA)},
		Tyolliset_2015 = {Tyolliset, 2015 (PT)},

		Asuntojen_keskipinta_ala_2015 = {Asuntojen keskipinta-ala, 2015 (RA)},
		Tyolliset_2014 = {Tyolliset, 2014 (PT)},
		Tyottomat_2014 = {Tyottomat, 2014 (PT)},
		Asukkaat_yhteensa_2014 = {Asukkaat yhteensa, 2014 (HE)},
		Keski_ika_2014 = {Asukkaiden keski-ika, 2014 (HE)},
		Alempi_korkeakoulututkinto_2013 = {Alemman korkeakoulututkinnon suorittaneet, 2013 (KO)},
		Asukkaiden_keskitulot_2013 = {Asukkaiden keskitulot, 2013 (HR)},

properties.description: Read data from Omakotitalohinnat -file and load the data to SQL table.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Aluejako as string,
		{2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2015 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2015 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2016 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2016 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2017 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2017 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(20,2),
		{2018 Keskipinta-ala m2} as decimal(20,2),
		{2018 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Omakotitalohinnat2015
Omakotitalohinnat2015 select() ~> Select4
Select4 sink(input(
		Aluejako as string,
		Neliohinta_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Keskipinta_ala_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		Aluejako,
		Neliohinta_2015 = {2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2015 = {2015 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 = {2015 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2016 = {2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2016 = {2016 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 = {2016 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2017 = {2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2017 = {2017 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 = {2017 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Neliohinta_2018 = {2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Keskipinta_ala_2018 = {2018 Keskipinta-ala m2},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 = {2018 Kauppojen lukumaara}
	)) ~> sink1
Select4 sink(input(
		Aluejako as string,
		Neliohinta_2015 as string,
		Keskipinta_ala_2015 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as string,
		Neliohinta_2016 as string,
		Keskipinta_ala_2016 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as string,
		Neliohinta_2017 as string,
		Keskipinta_ala_2017 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as string,
		Neliohinta_2018 as string,
		Keskipinta_ala_2018 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['omakoti_curated'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2

properties.description: Read osakeasunto data from two files and join them together. Source files separated as they did not fit into one from Tilastokeskus. DerivedColumn2 has derivation for Postinumero, Alue and Kaupunki using Data Factory functions.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Postinumero as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		{2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2015 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2016 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2017 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer,
		{2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as decimal(10,0),
		{2018 Kauppojen lukumaara} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Osakeaasuntohinnat2015
source(output(
		Postinumero as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		{2010 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2010 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2011 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2011 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2012 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2012 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2013 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2013 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short,
		{2014 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)} as short,
		{2014 Kauppojen lukumaara} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Osakeasuntohinnat2010
Osakeaasuntohinnat2015 select(mapColumn(
		Postinumero,
		Talotyyppi,
		Rakennusvuosi,
		{2015 Neliohinta} = {2015 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2015 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		{2016 Neliohinta} = {2016 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2016 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		{2017 Neliohinta} = {2017 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2017 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		{2018 Neliohinta} = {2018 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		{2018 Kauppojen lukumaara}
	)) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(Postinumero = substring(Postinumero, 1, 5),
		Alue = trim(substring(Postinumero, instr(Postinumero, ' '), instr(Postinumero, '(') - instr(Postinumero, ' '))),
		Kaupunki = trim(substring(Postinumero, instr(Postinumero, '('), 50),' ())')) ~> DerivedColumn2
Osakeasuntohinnat2010 select() ~> Select3
DerivedColumn2, Select3 join(DerivedColumn2@Postinumero == substring(Select3@Postinumero, 1, 5)
	&& Select2@Talotyyppi == Select3@Talotyyppi
	&& Select2@Rakennusvuosi == Select3@Rakennusvuosi,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Postinumero = DerivedColumn2@Postinumero,
		Alue,
		Kaupunki,
		Talotyyppi = Select2@Talotyyppi,
		Rakennusvuosi = Select2@Rakennusvuosi,
		Neliohinta_2015 = {2015 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 = {2015 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2016 = {2016 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 = {2016 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2017 = {2017 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 = {2017 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2018 = {2018 Neliohinta},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 = {2018 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2010 = {2010 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2010 = {2010 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2011 = {2011 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2011 = {2011 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2012 = {2012 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2012 = {2012 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2013 = {2013 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2013 = {2013 Kauppojen lukumaara},
		Neliohinta_2014 = {2014 Neliohinta (EUR/m2)},
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2014 = {2014 Kauppojen lukumaara}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select7 sink(input(
		Postinumero as string,
		Alue as string,
		Kaupunki as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		Neliohinta_2010 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2010 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2011 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2011 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2012 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2012 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2013 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2013 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2014 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2014 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2017 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as integer,
		Neliohinta_2018 as decimal(20,2),
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	keys:['Postinumero','Talotyyppi','Rakennusvuosi']) ~> sink4
Select7 sink(input(
		Postinumero as string,
		Talotyyppi as string,
		Rakennusvuosi as string,
		Alue as string,
		Kaupunki as string,
		Neliohinta_2010 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2010 as string,
		Neliohinta_2011 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2011 as string,
		Neliohinta_2012 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2012 as string,
		Neliohinta_2013 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2013 as string,
		Neliohinta_2014 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2014 as string,
		Neliohinta_2015 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2015 as string,
		Neliohinta_2016 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2016 as string,
		Neliohinta_2017 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2017 as string,
		Neliohinta_2018 as string,
		Kauppojen_lukumaara_2018 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['osakeasunto_curated'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink5
